title: Natural Resources Policy
overview: Natural Resources Policy is an important part of state management and natural resources policies are one of the main tools used by the state to manage the country's resources. Therefore, this course is crucial for economics students, especially those in the field of natural resource economics. It provides students with knowledge and skills in natural resources policy.

skill_outcomes.outcome_description: Students will be able to analyze various natural resources policies.
Students will develop the ability to self-study and research.
Students will be able to work in groups and present their findings.
